thread.title: Teenagers found this kind hotel a perfect chois...
thread.title_full: Teenagers found this kind hotel a perfect chois... - Review of Appart Hotel Cosy Cadet, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Pille M
title: Teenagers found this kind hotel a perfect chois...
text: Family with teenagers in a weekend trip- quiet place not far from city center and not far from Monmartre- walking distance, hotel was near a walking-shopping street Passage Verdeau- excellent street for art-lovers (and fandom shops for teenagers). Hotel personal was friendly and rooms very large- kitchen clean, enough equipment. Breakfast- better than usual in Paris. And of course free Wi-Fi.
